Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class GreetSettingsService

Provides services for managing greeting settings and executing greetings and farewells in guilds.

Inheritance
object
GreetSettingsService
Implements
INService
IReadyExecutor
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()
Namespace: Mewdeko.Services
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public class GreetSettingsService : INService, IReadyExecutor

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

GreetSettingsService(DiscordSocketClient, GuildSettingsService, DbService, BotConfigService, EventHandler, Mewdeko)

Initializes a new instance of the GreetSettingsService class, setting up event handlers for user join and leave events, and guild join and leave events.

Declaration
public GreetSettingsService(DiscordSocketClient client, GuildSettingsService gss, DbService db, BotConfigService bss, EventHandler eventHandler, Mewdeko bot)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client instance to interact with the Discord API.
GuildSettingsService gss

The service managing guild settings.
DbService db

The service for database interactions.
BotConfigService bss

The service managing bot configurations.
EventHandler eventHandler

The handler managing Discord events.
Mewdeko bot

The main bot instance.
Remarks

Event handlers are set up to listen for specific Discord events, allowing the service to respond to user and guild activities such as joining, leaving, or boosting.

SetBoost(ulong, ulong, bool?)

Enables or disables the boost message feature for a guild.

Declaration
public Task<bool> SetBoost(ulong guildId, ulong channelId, bool? value = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The guild's unique identifier.
ulong channelId

The ID of the channel where boost messages should be sent.
bool? value

Optional. Specifies whether the boost message feature should be enabled or disabled. If not provided, the setting is toggled.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A boolean indicating whether the boost message feature is now enabled.
| Edit this page View Source

SetBoostDel(ulong, int)

Sets the deletion timer for boost messages in a guild.

Declaration
public Task SetBoostDel(ulong guildId, int timer)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The guild's unique identifier.
int timer

The time in seconds after which the boost message should be automatically deleted. Must be between 0 and 600.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

A timer value of 0 means the message will not be automatically deleted.

Exceptions
Type Condition
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if the timer is not within the valid range.
| Edit this page View Source

SetBoostMessage(ulong, string?)

Sets or updates the boost message for a specific guild.

Declaration
public Task<bool> SetBoostMessage(ulong guildId, string? message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier of the guild.
string message

The boost message to be set. Mentions within the message will be sanitized.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A boolean value indicating whether the boost message feature is enabled.
Remarks

This method updates the guild's configuration in the database and refreshes the local cache with the new settings.

SetBye(ulong, ulong, bool?)

Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The unique identifier of the guild.
ulong channelId

The channel ID where farewells should be sent.
bool? value

Optional. A boolean value indicating whether the feature should be enabled. If null, the setting will be toggled.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A boolean indicating whether the farewell message feature is enabled after the operation.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description

The guild object.
string url

The URL of the webhook to send greeting messages.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks
